record.title: MEASURE READ THE FIRST TIME--H.R. 1332

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I understand that H.R. 1332, has been received from the House and is at the desk, and I would ask for its first reading.

record.chair: The clerk will report the bill by title.
record.narrative: The legislative clerk read as follows:

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I now ask for a second reading, and I object to my own request.
